name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_156Eu
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Eu" means the element "europium" and "156Eu" is the isotope "europium-156" with a half-life of 1.52e+01 days.
